## Mission

Integrate Elasticsearch into existing services for full-text search and filtering.

## Branch

`claude/wave3/search-enhance`

## Scope

- Enhance OpportunityService with ES search
- Add search suggestions/autocomplete
- Implement saved search functionality
- Add faceted filtering

## Features

1. Full-text search across opportunities
2. Autocomplete suggestions
3. Faceted search (by NAICS, type, agency)
4. Saved searches with alerts

## Output

`docs/WAVE3_SEARCH_ENHANCE_COMPLETE.md`
